text: a security guard was arrested this week and is accused of stealing two los angeles lakers championship rings and $ 20,000 in gift cards , police said . eddie monterroso , 23 , who worked at a lakers training facility , was arrested tuesday outside the facility , the el segundo police department said . the two championship rings were from the 2009 and 2010 seasons , police said . a search of the suspect 's home on december 10  yielded evidence of the theft as well as the championship rings ,  according to an el segundo police department statement . he is facing charges of burglary and grand theft , police said . the gift cards were going to be used by the team to give away as donations to community groups for christmas , the los angeles times reported . the police were able to retrieve only $ 6,000 in the gift cards , the newspaper reported . cnn 's artemis moshtagian contributed to this report .
summary: the suspect was arrested outside a laker training facility .   the two rings were from the 2009 and 2010 seasons .   report : the gift cards were going to go to community groups .
